name: Football Manager 2013
description:
Football Manager 2013 is a strategy-sports game. It came out on 02-11-2012. It was published by SEGA. Football Manager 2013 has a Metascore of 86, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Football Manager 2013 is available on PC.
Miles Jacobson produced the game.
